title: It’s true, you can’t touch this
author: VD
content_html: When I see things like this, I have to admit that I feel a glimmer of hope for the human race. Do you want to know why God created Man? Because zebras and chimpanzees don’t do things like this. Umberto Eco is wrong. God laughs, and most of the time, He’s laughing at the infinite lunacies of Man.
content_text: When I see things like this, I have to admit that I feel a glimmer of hope for the human race.  Do you want to know why God created Man?  Because zebras and chimpanzees don’t do things like this.  Umberto Eco is wrong.  God laughs, and most of the time, He’s laughing at the infinite lunacies of Man.
